mapper.sql: SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.DATAAUDITDETAILID, t1.DATAAUDITDETAILNAME, t1.DATAAUDITID, t1.DATAAUDITNAME, t1.NEWTEXT, t1.NEWVALUE, t1.OLDTEXT, t1.OLDVALUE, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN FROM T_SRFDATAAUDITDETAIL t1

SELECT t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`DATAAUDITDETAILID`, t1.`DATAAUDITDETAILNAME`, t1.`DATAAUDITID`, t1.`DATAAUDITNAME`, t1.`NEWTEXT`, t1.`NEWVALUE`, t1.`OLDTEXT`, t1.`OLDVALUE`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN` FROM `T_SRFDATAAUDITDETAIL` t1

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.DATAAUDITDETAILID, t1.DATAAUDITDETAILNAME, t1.DATAAUDITID, t1.DATAAUDITNAME, t1.NEWTEXT, t1.NEWVALUE, t1.OLDTEXT, t1.OLDVALUE, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN FROM T_SRFDATAAUDITDETAIL t1

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE AS CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN AS CREATEMAN, t1.DATAAUDITDETAILID AS DATAAUDITDETAILID, t1.DATAAUDITDETAILNAME AS DATAAUDITDETAILNAME, t1.DATAAUDITID AS DATAAUDITID, t1.DATAAUDITNAME AS DATAAUDITNAME, t1.NEWTEXT AS NEWTEXT, t1.NEWVALUE AS NEWVALUE, t1.OLDTEXT AS OLDTEXT, t1.OLDVALUE AS OLDVALUE, t1.UPDATEDATE AS UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN AS UPDATEMAN FROM T_SRFDATAAUDITDETAIL t1

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE AS CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN AS CREATEMAN, t1.DATAAUDITDETAILID AS DATAAUDITDETAILID, t1.DATAAUDITDETAILNAME AS DATAAUDITDETAILNAME, t1.DATAAUDITID AS DATAAUDITID, t1.DATAAUDITNAME AS DATAAUDITNAME, t1.NEWTEXT AS NEWTEXT, t1.NEWVALUE AS NEWVALUE, t1.OLDTEXT AS OLDTEXT, t1.OLDVALUE AS OLDVALUE, t1.UPDATEDATE AS UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN AS UPDATEMAN FROM T_SRFDATAAUDITDETAIL t1

SELECT t1.[CREATEDATE], t1.[CREATEMAN], t1.[DATAAUDITDETAILID], t1.[DATAAUDITDETAILNAME], t1.[DATAAUDITID], t1.[DATAAUDITNAME], t1.[NEWTEXT], t1.[NEWVALUE], t1.[OLDTEXT], t1.[OLDVALUE], t1.[UPDATEDATE], t1.[UPDATEMAN] FROM [T_SRFDATAAUDITDETAIL] t1
